703271f-a.title: Brooklyn: Bowery - Stillwell Avenue
703271f-a.text:
Bowery, north side, east of Stillwell Ave., (Coney Island).
July 4, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
NEGG ~ E876

706906f-a.title: Brooklyn: Stillwell Avenue - Bowery
706906f-a.text:
Stillwell Ave., east side, from the Bowery to the Boardwalk. (Coney Island)
July 4, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
